recipe.title: Spinach Pie
ingredients: 23cm (9in) pie dish or several smaller individual pie dishes
instructions: 2. Steam the spinach, drain well and roughly chop. In a large bowl, mix the cooked spinach with the onion, beaten eggs and both types of cheese. Beat well and season with pepper and nutmeg.
3. Transfer mixture to one large pie dish, or individual dishes if using. Bake in preheated oven for 25–30 minutes.
